COLLECTION_DETAIL: The data in billions of US dollars are calculated using market exchange rates.

COMPILING_ORG: Bank of France; European Central Bank; Bank for International Settlements.
TITLE: France - Central bank, assets, total, BIS-spliced, USD
DATA_COMP: From June 2016 onwards: disaggregated financial statement of the Eurosystem. Between January 1999 and May 2016: monthly balance sheet items following the harmonised monetary statistics of monetary financial institutions. Between 1840 and 1998: Baubeau (2018): 'The Bank of France's balance sheets database, 1840-1998: an introduction to 158 years of central banking'. Before 1840: Bignon and Plüss (forthcoming): 'Accounting for the first 223 years of Banque de France balance sheets'.

Between January 1999 and May 2016: monthly balance sheet items following the harmonised monetary statistics of monetary financial institutions. Between 1840 and 1998: Baubeau (2018): 'The Bank of France's balance sheets database, 1840-1998: an introduction to 158 years of central banking'. Before 1840: Bignon and Plüss (forthcoming): 'Accounting for the first 223 years of Banque de France balance sheets'.

COLLECTION_DETAIL: The data in billions of US dollars are calculated using market exchange rates.
SUPP_INFO_BREAKS: This series is adjusted for breaks. Break-adjustment calculations follow the methodology outlined in the BIS Quarterly Review (2013). For further detail, see https://www.bis.org/publ/qtrpdf/r_qt1303z.htm
COMPILING_ORG: Bank of France; European Central Bank; Bank for International Settlements.

DATA_COMP: From June 2016 onwards: disaggregated financial statement of the Eurosystem. Between January 1999 and May 2016: monthly balance sheet items following the harmonised monetary statistics of monetary financial institutions. Between 1840 and 1998: Baubeau (2018): 'The Bank of France's balance sheets database, 1840-1998: an introduction to 158 years of central banking'. Before 1840: Bignon and Plüss (forthcoming): 'Accounting for the first 223 years of Banque de France balance sheets'.

COLLECTION_DETAIL: The data in billions of US dollars are calculated using market exchange rates.
SUPP_INFO_BREAKS: This series is adjusted for breaks. Break-adjustment calculations follow the methodology outlined in the BIS Quarterly Review (2013). For further detail, see https://www.bis.org/publ/qtrpdf/r_qt1303z.htm

COMPILING_ORG: Bank of France; European Central Bank; Bank for International Settlements.
TITLE: France - Central bank, assets, total, BIS-spliced, USD
DATA_COMP: From June 2016 onwards: disaggregated financial statement of the Eurosystem. Between January 1999 and May 2016: monthly balance sheet items following the harmonised monetary statistics of monetary financial institutions. Between 1840 and 1998: Baubeau (2018): 'The Bank of France's balance sheets database, 1840-1998: an introduction to 158 years of central banking'. Before 1840: Bignon and Plüss (forthcoming): 'Accounting for the first 223 years of Banque de France balance sheets'.

Between January 1999 and May 2016: monthly balance sheet items following the harmonised monetary statistics of monetary financial institutions. Between 1840 and 1998: Baubeau (2018): 'The Bank of France's balance sheets database, 1840-1998: an introduction to 158 years of central banking'. Before 1840: Bignon and Plüss (forthcoming): 'Accounting for the first 223 years of Banque de France balance sheets'.

COLLECTION_DETAIL: The data in billions of US dollars are calculated using market exchange rates.
SUPP_INFO_BREAKS: This series is adjusted for breaks. Break-adjustment calculations follow the methodology outlined in the BIS Quarterly Review (2013). For further detail, see https://www.bis.org/publ/qtrpdf/r_qt1303z.htm
COMPILING_ORG: Bank of France; European Central Bank; Bank for International Settlements.

DATA_COMP: From June 2016 onwards: disaggregated financial statement of the Eurosystem. Between January 1999 and May 2016: monthly balance sheet items following the harmonised monetary statistics of monetary financial institutions. Between 1840 and 1998: Baubeau (2018): 'The Bank of France's balance sheets database, 1840-1998: an introduction to 158 years of central banking'. Before 1840: Bignon and Plüss (forthcoming): 'Accounting for the first 223 years of Banque de France balance sheets'.

COLLECTION_DETAIL: The data in billions of US dollars are calculated using market exchange rates.
SUPP_INFO_BREAKS: This series is adjusted for breaks. Break-adjustment calculations follow the methodology outlined in the BIS Quarterly Review (2013). For further detail, see https://www.bis.org/publ/qtrpdf/r_qt1303z.htm

COMPILING_ORG: Bank of France; European Central Bank; Bank for International Settlements.
TITLE: France - Central bank, assets, total, BIS-spliced, USD
DATA_COMP: From June 2016 onwards: disaggregated financial statement of the Eurosystem. Between January 1999 and May 2016: monthly balance sheet items following the harmonised monetary statistics of monetary financial institutions. Between 1840 and 1998: Baubeau (2018): 'The Bank of France's balance sheets database, 1840-1998: an introduction to 158 years of central banking'. Before 1840: Bignon and Plüss (forthcoming): 'Accounting for the first 223 years of Banque de France balance sheets'.

Between January 1999 and May 2016: monthly balance sheet items following the harmonised monetary statistics of monetary financial institutions. Between 1840 and 1998: Baubeau (2018): 'The Bank of France's balance sheets database, 1840-1998: an introduction to 158 years of central banking'. Before 1840: Bignon and Plüss (forthcoming): 'Accounting for the first 223 years of Banque de France balance sheets'.

COLLECTION_DETAIL: The data in billions of US dollars are calculated using market exchange rates.
SUPP_INFO_BREAKS: This series is adjusted for breaks. Break-adjustment calculations follow the methodology outlined in the BIS Quarterly Review (2013). For further detail, see https://www.bis.org/publ/qtrpdf/r_qt1303z.htm
COMPILING_ORG: Bank of France; European Central Bank; Bank for International Settlements.

DATA_COMP: From June 2016 onwards: disaggregated financial statement of the Eurosystem. Between January 1999 and May 2016: monthly balance sheet items following the harmonised monetary statistics of monetary financial institutions. Between 1840 and 1998: Baubeau (2018): 'The Bank of France's balance sheets database, 1840-1998: an introduction to 158 years of central banking'. Before 1840: Bignon and Plüss (forthcoming): 'Accounting for the first 223 years of Banque de France balance sheets'.

COLLECTION_DETAIL: The data in billions of US dollars are calculated using market exchange rates.
SUPP_INFO_BREAKS: This series is adjusted for breaks. Break-adjustment calculations follow the methodology outlined in the BIS Quarterly Review (2013). For further detail, see https://www.bis.org/publ/qtrpdf/r_qt1303z.htm

COMPILING_ORG: Bank of France; European Central Bank; Bank for International Settlements.
TITLE: France - Central bank, assets, total, BIS-spliced, USD
DATA_COMP: From June 2016 onwards: disaggregated financial statement of the Eurosystem. Between January 1999 and May 2016: monthly balance sheet items following the harmonised monetary statistics of monetary financial institutions. Between 1840 and 1998: Baubeau (2018): 'The Bank of France's balance sheets database, 1840-1998: an introduction to 158 years of central banking'. Before 1840: Bignon and Plüss (forthcoming): 'Accounting for the first 223 years of Banque de France balance sheets'.

Between January 1999 and May 2016: monthly balance sheet items following the harmonised monetary statistics of monetary financial institutions. Between 1840 and 1998: Baubeau (2018): 'The Bank of France's balance sheets database, 1840-1998: an introduction to 158 years of central banking'. Before 1840: Bignon and Plüss (forthcoming): 'Accounting for the first 223 years of Banque de France balance sheets'.

COLLECTION_DETAIL: The data in billions of US dollars are calculated using market exchange rates.
SUPP_INFO_BREAKS: This series is adjusted for breaks. Break-adjustment calculations follow the methodology outlined in the BIS Quarterly Review (2013). For further detail, see https://www.bis.org/publ/qtrpdf/r_qt1303z.htm
COMPILING_ORG: Bank of France; European Central Bank; Bank for International Settlements.

DATA_COMP: From June 2016 onwards: disaggregated financial statement of the Eurosystem. Between January 1999 and May 2016: monthly balance sheet items following the harmonised monetary statistics of monetary financial institutions. Between 1840 and 1998: Baubeau (2018): 'The Bank of France's balance sheets database, 1840-1998: an introduction to 158 years of central banking'. Before 1840: Bignon and Plüss (forthcoming): 'Accounting for the first 223 years of Banque de France balance sheets'.

COLLECTION_DETAIL: The data in billions of US dollars are calculated using market exchange rates.
SUPP_INFO_BREAKS: This series is adjusted for breaks. Break-adjustment calculations follow the methodology outlined in the BIS Quarterly Review (2013). For further detail, see https://www.bis.org/publ/qtrpdf/r_qt1303z.htm

COMPILING_ORG: Bank of France; European Central Bank; Bank for International Settlements.
TITLE: France - Central bank, assets, total, BIS-spliced, USD
DATA_COMP: From June 2016 onwards: disaggregated financial statement of the Eurosystem. Between January 1999 and May 2016: monthly balance sheet items following the harmonised monetary statistics of monetary financial institutions. Between 1840 and 1998: Baubeau (2018): 'The Bank of France's balance sheets database, 1840-1998: an introduction to 158 years of central banking'. Before 1840: Bignon and Plüss (forthcoming): 'Accounting for the first 223 years of Banque de France balance sheets'.

Between January 1999 and May 2016: monthly balance sheet items following the harmonised monetary statistics of monetary financial institutions. Between 1840 and 1998: Baubeau (2018): 'The Bank of France's balance sheets database, 1840-1998: an introduction to 158 years of central banking'. Before 1840: Bignon and Plüss (forthcoming): 'Accounting for the first 223 years of Banque de France balance sheets'.

COLLECTION_DETAIL: The data in billions of US dollars are calculated using market exchange rates.
SUPP_INFO_BREAKS: This series is adjusted for breaks. Break-adjustment calculations follow the methodology outlined in the BIS Quarterly Review (2013). For further detail, see https://www.bis.org/publ/qtrpdf/r_qt1303z.htm
COMPILING_ORG: Bank of France; European Central Bank; Bank for International Settlements.

DATA_COMP: From June 2016 onwards: disaggregated financial statement of the Eurosystem. Between January 1999 and May 2016: monthly balance sheet items following the harmonised monetary statistics of monetary financial institutions. Between 1840 and 1998: Baubeau (2018): 'The Bank of France's balance sheets database, 1840-1998: an introduction to 158 years of central banking'. Before 1840: Bignon and Plüss (forthcoming): 'Accounting for the first 223 years of Banque de France balance sheets'.

COLLECTION_DETAIL: The data in billions of US dollars are calculated using market exchange rates.
SUPP_INFO_BREAKS: This series is adjusted for breaks. Break-adjustment calculations follow the methodology outlined in the BIS Quarterly Review (2013). For further detail, see https://www.bis.org/publ/qtrpdf/r_qt1303z.htm

COMPILING_ORG: Bank of France; European Central Bank; Bank for International Settlements.
TITLE: France - Central bank, assets, total, BIS-spliced, USD
DATA_COMP: From June 2016 onwards: disaggregated financial statement of the Eurosystem. Between January 1999 and May 2016: monthly balance sheet items following the harmonised monetary statistics of monetary financial institutions. Between 1840 and 1998: Baubeau (2018): 'The Bank of France's balance sheets database, 1840-1998: an introduction to 158 years of central banking'. Before 1840: Bignon and Plüss (forthcoming): 'Accounting for the first 223 years of Banque de France balance sheets'.
